CustomField.description: Pricing condition code to be sent to SAP
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Is_APPC__c) == 'Yes', IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Manual Handling Surcharge"),"Y593", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Security surcharge"),"Y595", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Unmanifested Article fee"),"Y503", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Returns Shipping costs"),"Y110", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Signature on Delivery fee"),"Y201", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Capture ID fee"),"Y202", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Capture ID (Addressee only) fee"),"Y203", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Transit Cover fee"),"Y224", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Return to Sender fee"),"Y502", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Fuel Surcharge"),"Y580", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Peak Fee"),"Y598", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Over Maximum Limits Fee"),"Y599", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Manifest Correction Fee"),"Y601", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Force Majeure Fee"),"Y603", IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Category__c, "Wine & Alcohol fee"),"Y206","Y101"))))))))))))))), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pricing condition code to be sent to SAP
CustomField.label: Pricing Condition Code
